Description:
Manage warehouse in compliance with company’s policies and procedures.
Oversee receiving, warehousing, and distribution operations.
Oversee daily operations, while controlling and managing inventory and logistics.
Ensure efficient space utilization.
Maintain documentation, activity log, and keep accurate records of warehouse activities.
Manage stock control, keep stock control systems up to date and make sure inventories are accurate.
Maintain warehouse’s material stock levels and availability and report any deficiencies to operation manager.
Oversees warehouse physical / cycle count inventory (regularly, monthly and random) and resolve any deficiencies as per the records available.
Ensure all orders are loaded within the scheduled shifts; Report all delays or variances in inbound/outbound shipments to the appropriate parties to take appropriate corrective actions.
Inspect all warehouse equipment and order repairs and replacements when required.
Oversee all warehouse employees, including creating schedules, providing coaching and mentoring, and issuing corrective action when required.
Comply and adhere to supervisor instructions.
Comply and respect of shift schedules.
Adhere to Health and Safety policies and procedures always, ensuring the protection and safety of self, co-workers, and environment.
Follow and enforce strict safety measures such as wearing heat-resistant gloves, protective masks, safety shoes, helmet, goggles, and earplugs.
Comply with company policies and procedures.Skills
Skills: Proficient in MS Office and SAP software
